summary: Dante is guided by his hero Virgil through each circle of Hell and its subdivisions until they reach the center of the Earth and emerged to the other hemisphere into Purgatory.
cast: Armand Mastroianni|Eric Roberts|Vincent Spano|Nia Peeples|Shirly Brener|Jeff Conaway|Hélène Cardona|Vanna Bonta|She|Bonnie Morgan|Eve Mauro|Rico Simonini|Gabriel Bologna|Adrian Paul|Al Sapienza|Jose Rosete|Vittorio Gassman|Vittorio Matteucci|Silvia Colloca|Riccardo Pratesi|Simona Caparrini|Veronica De Laurentiis|Maude Bonanni|Susanna Cappellaro|Giulia Pizzi|Marco Pancrazi|Cosimo Fusco|Arnoldo Foà|Marco Bonini|Mario Opinato
keywords: independent short|supernatural power|underground short|psychotronic short|dante alighieri
title: Dante's Hell Animated
